# criblio_search_dashboard_category (Resource)

SearchDashboardCategory Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "criblio_search_dashboard_category" "my_searchdashboardcategory" {
  description = "...my_description..."
  id          = "...my_id..."
  is_pack     = true
  name        = "...my_name..."
}
```
